author: Warhammer
description:
Ferren Areios, Captain of the Ultramarines’ 6th Company, is a warrior forged in the fires of the Indomitus Crusade. Chosen by the Primarch to lead his brothers in battle, the Master of Rites fights for the survival of Humanity and the realm of Ultramar. Tune in to this paint guide and learn how to paint this awesome character, without his helmet, quickly and easily!

title: How to Paint Ferren Areios – No Helmet | Warhammer 40,000
